subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Robert Bobroczkyi, a 15-year-old Romanian who plays for the Stellazzurra Basketball Academy in Rome, stands 7 feet 6 inches and has caught the eye of youth league scouts in Europe.
snippet: Robert Bobroczkyi, a 15-year-old Romanian who plays for the Stellazzurra Basketball Academy in Rome, stands 7 feet 6 inches and has caught the eye of youth league scouts in Europe.
